sys_update_xml.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="m2m_sp_widget_dependency"><m2m_sp_widget_dependency action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><sp_dependency display_value="perfect-sidebar">1aebf0851b0c5410c26db9121b4bcb86</sp_dependency><sp_widget display_value="Header Menu with Sidebar">151b78051b0c5410c26db9121b4bcbe1</sp_widget><sys_class_name>m2m_sp_widget_dependency</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>willian_costa</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-03-17 21:18:29</sys_created_on><sys_id>338bcb08074720109eaef19d7c1ed0f2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>perfect-sidebar.Header Menu with Sidebar</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>m2m_sp_widget_dependency_338bcb08074720109eaef19d7c1ed0f2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>willian_costa</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-03-17 21:18:29</sys_updated_on></m2m_sp_widget_dependency></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sp_header_footer_151b78051b0c5410c26db9121b4bcbe1
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_header_footer"><sp_header_footer action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><category>custom</category><client_script><![CDATA[function ($document, $rootScope, $scope, snRecordWatcher, spUtil, $location, $uibModal, cabrillo, $timeout, $window) {
	var c = this;	
	
		
	var ps = new PerfectScrollbar('#scroll-sidebar', {});
	
		
	if(c.data.page == "home_csm" || c.data.page == null){
		$("section").addClass("visible-form");
		$("main").addClass("sidebar-form");
	}


	$scope.collapse = function() {
		$rootScope.$emit('sp-navbar-collapse');
	}

	$scope.avatarProfile = {
		userID: $scope.user.sys_id,
		name: $scope.user.name,
		initials: $window.NOW.user_initials
	};

	if ($window.NOW.user_avatar) {
		$scope.avatarProfile.userImage = $window.NOW.user_avatar;
	}

	if (cabrillo.isNative()) {
		if ($window.innerWidth < 767) {
			$scope.isViewNative = true;
		} else {
			$scope.isViewNativeTablet = true;
		}
	}


	$scope.openPopUp = function() {
		var url = "$chat_support.do?queueID=" + $scope.data.connect_support_queue_id;
		var popup = window.open (url, "popup", "width=900, height=600");
	};

	$scope.openLogin = function () {
		$scope.modalInstance = $uibModal.open({
			templateUrl: 'modalLogin',
			scope: $scope
		});
	};

	var xsScreenSize = isXSScreenSize();
	$scope.showXSAvatar = isXSScreenSize();
	$scope.showAvatar = !isXSScreenSize();

	$scope.isAgentChatConfigured = g_has_agent_chat_config;

	angular.element($window).on('resize', function () {
		if(xsScreenSize !== isXSScreenSize() && (!$scope.showXSAvatar || !$scope.showAvatar)){
			$scope.showXSAvatar = true;
			$scope.showAvatar = true;
		}
	});


	function isXSScreenSize() {
		return $window.matchMedia('(max-width: 767px)').matches;
	}

	$rootScope.$on('sp.avatar_changed', function(evt, obj) {
		$scope.userID = "";
		$scope.newAvatarId = obj.newAvatarId;
		$timeout(function(){
			$scope.userID = $scope.user.sys_id;
			$(".sub-avatar").css("background-image", 'url("' + $scope.newAvatarId + '.iix?t=small")');
		});
	});

	$scope.isHomepage = function() {
		if (!$scope.page.id)
			return true;

		if ($scope.page.id == $scope.portal.homepage_dv)
			return true;

		return false;
	};


	/**
			*	This part is responsible for collapsing the sidebar
			*
			*	c.status = when is 'C' means to collapse sidebar. 
			*						 If is open, the sidebar are extended.
			*						 
			*	The class 'sidebar-collapsed' define a padding-left according to sidebar status.
	**/

	//Define inicial status for sidebar, based on user preference
	$timeout (function() {
		$("#scroll-sidebar li a span:last-child").addClass("hidden");
		c.status = c.data.menuStatus;
		c.manageSidebar(c.status);
	});

	c.manageSidebar = function(status) {
		if (c.status == 'close') {
			c.sidebar = true;
			$('main').removeClass('sidebar-expanded').addClass('sidebar-collapsed');
			$("#scroll-sidebar li a span:last-child").addClass("hidden");
		} else {
			c.status = 'open';
			c.sidebar = false;
			$('main').removeClass('sidebar-collapsed').addClass('sidebar-expanded');
			$("#scroll-sidebar li a span:last-child").removeClass("hidden");
		}
	}

	$scope.closeForm = function(){
		$("main").removeClass("sidebar-form");
		$(".side-form-csm").removeClass("visible-form");
		//$scope.clickSidebar("close");
	}

	// Habilitar Formulario Menu Lateral
	$(document).on("click", '.navbar-nav .header-menu-item:nth-child(3)', function(){

		if(!xsScreenSize){
			c.sidebar = false;
			$scope.clickSidebar("close");
			c.manageSidebar("close");
			$scope.closeForm();
		}

		$("main").removeClass("sidebar-expanded");
		$("main").addClass("sidebar-form");
		$(".side-form-csm").addClass("visible-form");
		$(".sidebar").css("display","block");
	});

	$(document).on("click", '.search-widget .input-group-btn', function(){
		$(".search-widget .input-group").addClass("active");
	});


	$(document).on("click", ".navbar-scroll .navbar-nav li a", function(){
		if(isXSScreenSize()){
			c.activated = false;
			c.changeHeightMobileMenu(c.activated);
		}
			

		//$(".sidebar").hide();
		
	});


	/**
			* Define state of sidebar: close = colapsed
			*					                 open = extended
			*
			*	@param: {boolean} status - based on value of c.sidebar.
		**/
	$scope.clickSidebar = function (status) {

		if(status) {
			c.status = 'close';

			angular.element('.expand').each(function() {
				$(this).removeClass('jam-minus').addClass('jam-plus');
			})

			angular.element('.subitem-container').each(function() {
				$(this).slideUp();
			})

			$("#scroll-sidebar li a span:last-child").addClass("hidden");


		} else {

			$(".side-form-csm").removeClass("visible-form");
			$("main").removeClass("sidebar-form");
			$("main").addClass("sidebar-collapsed");

			c.status = 'open';
			$("#scroll-sidebar li a span:last-child").removeClass("hidden");
		}

		//Save the preference for user.
		c.server.get({action: 'setViewPreference', pref: c.status}).then(function (re){
		});

		//Passes the status to widget responsible for get menu items
		$timeout(function () {
			$scope.$broadcast("changeMenuStatus", c.status);
			angular.element('.sidebar-search').focus();	
		});

		if ($('main').hasClass('sidebar-collapsed')) {
			$('main').removeClass('sidebar-collapsed').addClass('sidebar-expanded');
		} else if ($('main').hasClass('sidebar-expanded')) {
			$('main').removeClass('sidebar-expanded').addClass('sidebar-collapsed');
		}
	}
	//Manipulate sidebar from another widget
	$scope.$on("toggleSidebar", function(evt, status) {
		c.clickSidebar(status);

		if (status === 'close') c.sidebar = true;
		else c.sidebar = false;
	});



	//Change status of dropdown menu on mobile.
	$scope.$on("closeMenuMobile", function(evt, close){ 
		c.activated = close;	
		c.clickTopMenu(c.activated);
		c.changeHeightMobileMenu(c.activated);
	});

	//c.activated = false;
	c.clickTopMenu = function (activated) {
		$(".side-form-csm").removeClass("visible-form");
		if(!activated) {
			$('.navbar-collapse').css('display','none');
		} else {
			$('.navbar-collapse').css('display','block');
		}		
	}


	c.changeHeightMobileMenu = function (activated) {
		if(!activated) {
			$('.sidebar').hide(); //.css('cssText', 'height: 0');
		} else {	
			$('.sidebar').show();
			$('.sidebar').css('cssText', 'height: 107%');
		}		
	}


}
]]></client_script><controller_as>c</controller_as><css>.header .navbar-inverse .navbar-nav > li > a:hover, 
.header .navbar-inverse .navbar-nav > li > a:focus{
  background: transparent;
  color: $navbar-inverse-link-hover-color;
}

#scroll-sidebar{
  ul{
    overflow: auto;
    padding-bottom: 45px;
    li{
      list-style: none;
      span:first-child{
        font-size: 26px;
        padding: 0 23px 0 0;
        border-left: 0 solid white;
        width: 26px;
        margin-right: 16px;
      }
      #tour-dropdown, #cart-dropdown{
        display: none;
      }
    }
  }

  .search-widget div.input-group{
    width: auto;
    border-bottom: 1px solid white;

  }

}


.center{
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
}

.search-widget{
  .dropdown-menu{
    li{
      width: 100%;
      display: none;

      span{
        white-space: break-spaces;
      }
    }
    li:first-child, li:nth-child(2), li:nth-child(3), li:nth-child(4), li:nth-child(5), li:nth-child(6){
      display: block;
    }

  }
}

::-webkit-scrollbar {
  width: 4px;
}

/* Track */
::-webkit-scrollbar-track {
  background: transparent; 
}

/* Handle */
::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb {
  background: $primary; 
}

.search-widget{
  div.input-group.active{
    width: 208px;
    border-bottom: 1px solid $navbar-inverse-link-color;

  }
  div.input-group{
    transition: width .4s;
    border-bottom: 1px solid transparent;
    width: 35px;
    top: 3px;
    input{
      background: transparent;
      color: $navbar-inverse-link-color;
      border: none;
      display: block;
      box-shadow: none;
    }
    button{
      color: $navbar-inverse-link-color;
      background: transparent;
      border: none;
      font-size: 18px;
    }

    @media (min-width: 768px){
      input::-webkit-input-placeholder { /* Edge */
        color: $navbar-inverse-link-color;
      }

      input:-ms-input-placeholder { /* Internet Explorer 10-11 */
        color: $navbar-inverse-link-color;
      }

      input::placeholder {
        color: $navbar-inverse-link-color;
      }
    }

    @media (max-width: 767px){
      input::-webkit-input-placeholder { /* Edge */
        color: $navbar-inverse-link-hover-color;
      }

      input:-ms-input-placeholder { /* Internet Explorer 10-11 */
        color: $navbar-inverse-link-hover-color;
      }

      input::placeholder {
        color: $navbar-inverse-link-hover-color;
      }
    }
  }
}

@media (max-width: 767px){
  div.input-group.active{
    width: 140px;
  }
}


.menu-icon {
  width: 27px;
  height: 3px;
  background-color: #FFF;
  margin: 3px 0;
}

.simplebar-content-wrapper {
  padding-bottom: 13px;
}

.navbar-scroll {
  height: calc(100vh);
}

.ps__rail-y {
  width: 0;
  top: 0;
}

.font-wrapper:after {
  content: $text-font;
}

.button-sidebar-top {
  color: #FFF;
  font-size: 35px;
  float: right;
  margin-top: 10px;
  display: none;
  bottom: 0;

}

.navbar-collapse{
  display:none;
}

.sidebar {
  a {
    color: $navbar-inverse-link-color;
  }
}

.nav > li > a {
  padding: 10px 20px;
}

.dropdown-menu > li > a {
  cursor: pointer;
}

.border-left {
  border-left: 1px solid $text-muted;
}

.applications-dropdown {
  margin-top: 0;
  left: -21px;
  border-radius: 0 0 4px 4px;
}

.portals {
  margin-left: 20px;
  height: 100%;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;

  li {
    list-style: none;
  }
}

.dropdown {
  .dd-menu {
    margin-top: 0;
    border-radius: 0 0 4px 4px;

    li {
      color: #3a3f51;
      cursor: pointer;
    }

    li:hover {
      background: white;
      color: #fff;
      border-radius: 0;
    } 
  }

  .dropdown-user {
    margin-top: 18px;
    padding: 8px 0;

    > li > a {
      padding-top: 7px;
      padding-bottom: 7px;
    }
  }
}



@media (max-width: 767px) {
  .user .dropdown-header-template {
    margin-top: 4px;
  }

  .dropdown-header-template .dropdown-toggle {    
    .visible-xs {
      display: inline-block;    
    }
  }
}

.btn-talk {
  margin: 10px 0;
}
.navbar {
  z-index: 1001;
  transition: 250ms opacity ease-in-out;
  -webkit-transition: 250ms opacity ease-in-out;
  border: 0;
  border-bottom: 4px solid $sp-navbar-divider-color;
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
  box-shadow: 2px 3px 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, .2);

  .navbar-right {
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    margin-left: auto;
  }
}

.language-toggle,
.language-toggle > div {
  display: flex;
}

.language-toggle {
  margin-left: 15px;
  padding: $header-padding-top-bottom 0 $header-padding-top-bottom 30px;
}

.language-toggle .dropdown-language {
  .btn {
    color: $navbar-inverse-link-color;

  }
}

@media screen and (max-width: 767px){
  .nav > li > a {
    font-size: 12px;

    &:hover {
      background-color: $brand-info;
    }
  }

  .navbar-nav .open .dropdown-menu {
    position: absolute;
    background-color: white;

    a {
      color: #4C5061;
      padding-left: 10px;

      &:hover{
        background-color: #f0f4f1;
      }
    }
  }

  .applications-dropdown {
    left: 0;
  }

  .dropdown-user {
    min-width: 143px;
  }

  .btn-outline-white {
    padding: 3px 5px;
    font-size: 14px;
    margin-left: 0;
  }

  #languages-dropdown {
    padding: 0;
    margin: 5px;
  }

  .dropdown-language {
    margin-bottom: 50px;
  }

}


.navbar-brand {
  max-height: 60px;
  padding: 0;
  padding-bottom: 0.5rem;
}

.navbar-brand img, .navbar-brand span {
  margin-left: $sp-logo-margin-x;
  margin-right: $sp-logo-margin-x;
  margin-top: $sp-logo-margin-y;
  margin-bottom: $sp-logo-margin-y;
  display: block;
  max-height: $sp-logo-max-height;
  max-width: $sp-logo-max-width;
  position: relative;
  top: 50%;
  -webkit-transform: translateY(-50%);
  -ms-transform: translateY(-50%);
  transform: translateY(-50%);
}
.breadcrumb-container {
  background-color: $panel-bg;
}

/* for mobile app */
.navbar-inverse.is-native {
  background-color: #405060;
}

nav{
  margin-bottom: 0px;
  border-radius: 0px;
}

.navbar-collapse{
  padding: 0px;
}

.navbar-nav {
  margin: 0px;
}

// PRB711244: Dropdown menu is scrollable when too many items
.scrollable-dropdown {
  max-height: 80vh;
  overflow: auto;
  height: auto;
}

.is-native {
  .scrollable-dropdown {
    max-height: 100vh;
    overflow: scroll;
    height: auto;
  }
}


/* PRB923910: Fix for Service Portal - Header Poorly Aligned in Safari */
@media screen and (min-width: 768px) {
  .collapse {
    display: flex;
  }
}



.button-sidebar {
  padding: 10px;
  color: white;
  font-size: 24px;
  position: fixed;
  bottom: 0;
  background: $secondary;
  color: #B4CCE0;
}

.sidebar {
  height: auto;
  width: 250px;
  position: fixed;
  background: $navbar-inverse-bg;
  z-index: 1000;

  .navbar-header {
    width: 100%;
    @include flex-align;
  }

  .navbar-brand {
    float: initial;

    img {
      margin-top: 2px;
      margin-bottom: 2px;
    }
  }

  .navbar-toggle {
    margin-left: auto;
  }
}

@media screen and (max-width: 767px) {
  .button-sidebar-top {
    flex-direction: column;
    display: flex;
  }
  
  button.navbar-toggle{
  	background: none;
  }
  
  .navbar-collapse {
    display: none;
  }

  .button-sidebar{
    display: none;
  }

  body {
    padding-left: 0;
  }
}

.sidebar.opened-sidebar{
  .nav{  
    li{  
      a{
        border-bottom: 1px solid rgba(0,0,0,0.15)
      }
    }
  }
  ;
  .collapse.button-sidebar{
    padding: 10px 0;
    .center{
      margin: 0 auto;
      span,p{
        float: left;
      }

    }
  }
}

.sidebar.close-sidebar {
  width: 70px;

  .button-sidebar {
    justify-content: center;
    width: 70px;
  }

  .navbar-nav > li {
    width: 100%;

    .jam-heart-f:before {
      text-size: 70px;
    }

    > a { 
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      transition: 0.3s;
    }
  }
}

@media screen and (min-width: 768px) {

  .sidebar-left{
    /*side height*/
    height: calc(100vh);
  }

  .sidebar {
    width: 250px;
    -webkit-transition: width 0.5s; /* Safari */
    transition: width 0.5s;

    &:not(.close-sidebar) {
      .jam {
        padding-left: 4px;
      }
      .button-sidebar {
        padding-left: 15px;
      }
    }

    .button-sidebar {
      p {
        white-space: nowrap;
        margin-left: 15px;
        font-size: 14px;
        margin-top: 8px;
      }
      justify-content: initial;
      width: 250px;
      transition: width 0.5s;
    }


    &.close-sidebar a {
      max-width: 70px;
    }

    -brand {
      margin-top: 0px;
      width: $header-sidebar-width;
      display: block;
  }

  .navbar-nav > li {
    width: 250px;

    .jam {
      text-size: 24px;
    }

    > a {
      padding-top: 16px;
      padding-bottom: 16px;
      font-size: $header-menu-text-size;
      text-transform: $header-menu-text-transform;

      &:hover, &:focus {
        background: $secondary;
      }
    }

    > .dropdown-menu {
      width: 400px;
      border: none;
      border-radius: 0;
      box-shadow: none;
    }

    > .dropdown-menu,
    > .dropdown-menu .panel {
      background-color: $header-sidebar-expanded-color;
    }
  }

  .logout {
    margin: 0;
    padding: 0;
    width: 100%;
    position: absolute;
    bottom: 0;
    left: 0;
    list-style: none;
    background: lighten($navbar-inverse-bg, 15%);


    li {
      padding: 15px 40px;
      display: flex;
      align-items: center;
      color: #fff;
    }

    .fa {
      margin-right: 10px;
      font-size: 20px;
    }
  }
}
}

.loader-container {
  width: 100%;
  height: 100vh;
  @include flex-align;
  justify-content: center;
  position: fixed;
  top: 0;
  left: 0;
  background: rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6);
  z-index: 999;
}

.loader {
  color: #fff;
  position: fixed;
  box-sizing: border-box;
  left: -9999px;
  top: -9999px;
  width: 0;
  height: 0;
  overflow: hidden;
  z-index: 999999
}

.loader:after,
.loader:before {
  box-sizing: border-box;
  display: none
}

.loader.is-active:after,
.loader.is-active:before {
  display: block
}

@keyframes rotation {
  0% {
    transform: rotate(0)
  }
  to {
    transform: rotate(359deg)
  }
}

.loader-default:after {
  content: "";
  position: fixed;
  width: 48px;
  height: 48px;
  border: 8px solid #fff;
  border-left-color: transparent;
  border-radius: 50%;
  top: calc(50% - 24px);
  left: calc(50% - 24px);
  animation: rotation 1s linear infinite;
}


.btn-outline-white {
  background-color: transparent;
  border: 1px solid white;
  color: white;
  border-radius: 3px;
  padding: 10px 30px;
  margin: auto;
  margin-left: 15px;
  font-weight: 800;

}

.btn-outline-white:hover {
  border-color: #D6DCDE;
  color: #D6DCDE;
}

@media screen and (max-width: 767px){

  .language-toggle {
    padding-top: 20px;
  }

  .nav > li > a {
    font-size: 12px;
  }

  .btn-outline-white {
    padding: 3px 5px;
    font-size: 14px;
    margin-left: 0;
  }

  .full-horizontal {
    width: 100%;
    margin-left: -9px;
  }

  #languages-dropdown {
    padding: 0;
    margin: 5px;
  }

  .dropdown-language {
    margin-bottom: 50px;
  }

  .sidebar {
    right: 0;
  }
}

.portal-option {
  margin-left: -20px;
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  font-weight: 800;
  color: white;
  text-transform:Â uppercase;
}


@media screen and (max-width: 1156px) and (min-width: 992px){
  .nav > li > a {
    font-size: 13px;
  }

  .btn-outline-white {
    padding: 5px 10px;
    margin-left: 5px;
    font-size: 14px;
  }

  button#languages-dropdown {
    padding: 5px;
  }

  .btn-talk {
    margin: 15px 0;
  }
}

@media screen and (max-width: 992px) and (min-width: 768px) {
  .nav > li > a {
    font-size: 12px;
  }

  .btn-outline-white {
    padding: 5px 10px;
    margin-left: 5px ;
    font-size: 12px;
  }

  button#languages-dropdown {
    padding: 0px;
  }

  .btn-talk {
    margin: 15px 0;
  }

  .portal-option {
    display: flex;
  }

}

#switchModal {
  .modal-body {
    width: 100%;
    display: table;
  }

  textarea {
    height: 150px;
  }
}

.navbar-inverse .navbar-nav > .open > a, .navbar-inverse .navbar-nav > .open > a:hover, .navbar-inverse .navbar-nav > .open > a:focus{
  background-color: transparent;
}


.navbar-inverse,
.navbar, .sidebar {
  border-color: $secondary;
}

.navbar{
  background-color: $navbar-inverse-bg;
}

.navbar-inverse .navbar-nav > li > a {
  color: $navbar-inverse-link-color;  
}

@media (min-width: 992px){
  .navbar-brand img{
    left: 6px;
  }
}



@media (min-width: 992px){
  .sidebar-collapsed{
    padding-left: 70px;
  }
}





.sidebar .navbar-nav > li > a:hover{
  border-color: $secondary;
}

@media (max-width: 767px){
    div.sidebar.close-sidebar {
      width: 200px;
      .button-sidebar{
      	display: none !important;
      }
    }

}

@media (min-width: 768px){
  .close-sidebar{
    #scroll-sidebar{
      ul{
        li{
          border-color: #002C63;
          span:nth-child(2), span:nth-child(3){
            display: none;
          }
        }
      }
    }
  }
}
#scroll-sidebar{
  ul{
    li{
      span:nth-child(2), span:nth-child(3){
        display: block;
      }
      span:nth-child(3){
        display: inline-block;
      }
      span:first-child{
        float: left;
      }
    }
  }
}




@media(max-width: 768px){
  .nav > li{
    float: left;
    top: 10px;
  }
}



@media screen and (max-width: 767px){
  .navbar-nav .open .dropdown-menu {
    position: absolute;
    background-color: white;
  }

  .navbar-toggle{
    border: none;
    background-color: white;
    .icon-bar{
      background: $principal;
    }
  }

  .navbar-inverse .navbar-toggle:hover, .navbar-inverse .navbar-toggle:focus{
    background: none;

  }

  .search-widget{
    div.input-group{ 
      input{
        color: white;
      }
      input::placeholder { /* Chrome, Firefox, Opera, Safari 10.1+ */
        color: white;
        opacity: 1; /* Firefox */
      }

      input:-ms-input-placeholder { /* Internet Explorer 10-11 */
        color: white;
      }

      input::-ms-input-placeholder { /* Microsoft Edge */
        color: white;
      }
      button{
        color: white;
      }
    }
  }
}

.toggle-dropdown:hover{
  background-color: transparent;
}

.navbar-nav .open .dropdown-menu {
  position: absolute;
  background-color: white;
  left: -20px;
  box-shadow: 0px 4px 23px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.25);
}

::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb{
  background: transparent;
}


.nav .open > a, .nav .open > a:hover, .nav .open > a:focus{
  background-color: $secondary;
  color: $navbar-inverse-link-color;
}

.nav .open > a:hover, .nav .open > a:focus{
  color: $navbar-inverse-link-hover-color;
}

.dropdown-toggle{
  span:nth-child(2){
    float: left; 
    margin-right: 10px;
  }

}

.sidebar{
  #scroll-sidebar{
    .navbar-nav {
      .open{
        .dropdown-menu{
          position: relative;
          background-color: $secondary;
          padding: 14px 45px;
          li{
            a{
              border-bottom: 0;
              span{
                font-size: 16px;
              }
              &:hover{
                background-color: transparent;
                color: $navbar-inverse-link-hover-color;
              }
              span.fa{
                margin: 0;
                position: relative;
                top: 3px;
              }
            }
          }
        }
      }
    }
  }
}



</css><data_table>sp_instance</data_table><demo_data/><description/><docs/><field_list/><has_preview>false</has_preview><id/><internal>false</internal><link><![CDATA[function(scope, element) {
	
	if(!scope.data.user_logged){
		$("main.body").css("padding-left", "0");
		$('.sidebar').hide();
	}
	
	$(document).keyup(function(event) {
		if (event.which == 9 || event.which == 37 || event.which == 39) { //tab key handler + arrow keys
			if ($(event.target).parents(".dropdown-menu").length == 0) { //if we are NOT inside a dropdown...
				//close the dropdowns
				$(".dropdown").removeClass("open");
				$("[data-toggle='dropdown']").attr("aria-expanded", "false");
			}
		}
	});
	

	$(element).on('click.nav','.navbar-collapse.in',function(e) {
		var target = $(e.target);
		if (target.is('a')) {
			if (target.hasClass('sp-menu-has-items'))
				return; // menu item has a submenu, so just toggle it

			// collapse mobile nav if clicked an anchor
			$(this).removeClass('in').addClass('collapse');
			return;
		}

		if (target.parent().hasClass("toggle-dropdown")) {
			// collapse mobile nav if parent has toggle-dropdown class
			$(this).removeClass('in').addClass('collapse');
			return;
		}

		// if neither target nor parent is an anchor, do nothing
		if (!target.parent().is('a'))
			return;

		// collapse mobile nav if target is part of a submenu
		if (target.parents("ul.dropdown-menu").length > 0)
			$(this).removeClass('in').addClass('collapse');
	});
	
}]]></link><name>Header Menu with Sidebar</name><option_schema/><public>true</public><roles/><script><![CDATA[// Defines the support queue ID that will be linked to by the Live Chat link in header
data.user_logged = gs.getSession().isLoggedIn();
data.page = $sp.getParameter("id");
data.connect_support_queue_id = $sp.getValue('sp_chat_queue');
data.login_page = $sp.getValue('login_page');
data.profileBtnMsg = gs.getMessage("User options");
var menu = $sp.getValue("sp_rectangle_menu");
data.menu = $sp.getWidgetFromInstance(menu);
data.menuStatus = "close";
data.search_option = {
	"title": gs.getMessage("Pesquisar") + "..."
};
	// '{"title": "' + gs.getMessage("Pesquisar") + '"..."}';


if (data.menu && data.menu.data) {
	data.menu.data.replace = true;
	// Hide login if menu already has link to login
	data.hasLogin = false;
	if (data.menu.data.menu.items) {
		for(var i in data.menu.data.menu.items) {
			var item = data.menu.data.menu.items[i];
			if (item.type == 'page' && item.sp_page == data.login_page)
				data.hasLogin = true;
		}
	}
}

data.loginWidget = $sp.getWidgetFromInstance('login-modal');
data.TCNotificationWidget = $sp.getWidget('target-comunication-Notification');]]></script><servicenow>false</servicenow><static>false</static><sys_class_name>sp_header_footer</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>willian@organizecloudlabs.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-04-06 14:02:05</sys_created_on><sys_id>151b78051b0c5410c26db9121b4bcbe1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>275</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Header Menu with Sidebar</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_header_footer_151b78051b0c5410c26db9121b4bcbe1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>willian_costa</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-03-19 19:02:54</sys_updated_on><template><![CDATA[<div class="header">
  <nav class="navbar-inverse" ng-class="::{'navbar':!isViewNative, 'is-native': isViewNative}"
       role="navigation">
    <div ng-show="::!isViewNative" class="navbar-header">
      <a class="navbar-brand" ng-if="::!portal.logo" href="?id={{::portal.homepage_dv}}"><span ng-bind="portal.title"></span></a>
      <a class="navbar-brand navbar-brand-logo" ng-if="::portal.logo" ng-href="?id={{::portal.homepage_dv}}" ng-click="collapse()" aria-label="${Go to homepage}">
        <img ng-src="{{::portal.logo}}" title="ServiceNow" role="presentation" alt="${Portal Logo}" />
      </a>
    </div>

    <div sp-navbar-toggle="" class="collapse navbar-right" id="sp-nav-bar">
      <!-- Include The Menu -->
      <ul ng-if="(!user.logged_in && page.id != portal.login_page_dv && !data.hasLogin)" class="nav navbar-nav" role="presentation">
        <li role="presentation"><a href ng-click="::openLogin()">${Login}</a></li>
      </ul>
      <ul ng-if="user.logged_in" class="nav navbar-nav" role="menubar">

        <li class="search-widget custom-search-widget hidden-xs">
          <widget id="typeahead-search" options="data.search_option"></widget>
        </li>

        <!-- chat, avatar, and logout -->
        <li ng-if="::(data.connect_support_queue_id && !isAgentChatConfigured)" role="presentation"><a href ng-click="openPopUp()" role="menuitem">${Live Chat}</a></li>

        <li>
          <sp-widget ng-if="data.TCNotificationWidget" widget="data.TCNotificationWidget"></sp-widget>
        </li>

        <li class="dropdown dropdown-header-template">
          <a href class="dropdown-toggle right-side block" data-toggle="dropdown" aria-expanded="false" title="{{::data.profileBtnMsg}}" id="profile-dropdown" role="button" aria-haspopup="true">
            <span class="navbar-avatar" aria-hidden="true"><sn-avatar class="avatar-small-medium m-r-xs" primary="avatarProfile" /></span>
            <span ng-if="showAvatar" class="hidden-xs">{{user.name}}</span>
            <span ng-if="showXSAvatar" class="visible-xs"><i class="fa fa-sort-down"></i></span>
          </a>
          <ul class="dropdown-menu dropdown-user" role="menu">
            <li role="presentation">
              <a ng-href="?id=csm_profile&sys_id={{::user.sys_id}}" role="menuitem">${Profile}</a>
            </li>
            <li role="presentation">
              <a ng-href="?id=csm_profile&sys_id={{::user.sys_id}}" role="menuitem">${Change Password}</a>
            </li>
        
            <li ng-if="::!isViewNative" role="presentation">
              <a href="{{::portal.logoutUrl}}" role="menuitem">${Logout}</a>
            </li>
          </ul>
        </li>

        <button type="button" class="navbar-toggle collapsed" ng-click="c.activated = !c.activated; c.clickTopMenu(c.activated); c.changeHeightMobileMenu(c.activated)">
          <span class="sr-only">${Toggle navigation}</span>
          <span class="icon-bar"></span>
          <span class="icon-bar"></span>
          <span class="icon-bar"></span>
        </button>

      </ul>
    </div>
  </nav>
</div>



<!--- Sidebar Header  --->
<div ng-class="{'close-sidebar': c.status == 'close', 'opened-sidebar': c.status == 'open'}" class="sidebar sidebar-left" >
  <div id="scroll-sidebar" style="overflow: hidden !important;" class="navbar-collapse collapse navbar-scroll">  

    <div class="search-widget custom-search-widget hidden-md hidden-sm hidden-lg">
      <widget id="typeahead-search" options="data.search_option"></widget>
    </div>

    <sp-widget widget="::data.menu"></sp-widget>
  </div>


  <div class="collapse navbar-collapse button-sidebar" ng-click="c.sidebar = !c.sidebar; clickSidebar(c.sidebar)" >
    <div class="center arrow">
      <span class="arrow" ng-if="c.status =='open'"><i class="fa fa-angle-double-left"></i></span>
      <span ng-if="c.status =='close'"><i class="fa fa-angle-double-right"></i></span>
      <p class="text-button m-b-none" ng-if="c.status == 'open'">
        ${Fechar}
      </p>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>
]]></template></sp_header_footer></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sp_theme_cbca4308074720109eaef19d7c1ed0c9
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_theme"><sp_theme action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><css_variables>// Grays
$gray-base: #000000;
$gray-dark: lighten($gray-base, 18.04%);
$gray-darker: lighten($gray-base, 8.24%);
$gray-light: lighten($gray-base, 40%);
$gray-lighter: lighten($gray-base, 94.51%);
$gray: lighten($gray-base, 29.02%);

////// Branding variables //////
// should always end with !default and no other variable should have !default
$brand-primary: #1F8476 !default;
$brand-secondary: #5a7f71 !default;
$body-bg: #ffffff !default;
$brand-success: #48C891 !default;
$state-success-text: darken(desaturate(adjust-hue($brand-success, 3), 15.64%), 34.31) !default;
$sp-navbar-divider-color: #5A7F71 !default;
$text-color: $gray-dark !default;
$navbar-inverse-link-hover-color: #ffffff !default;
$navbar-inverse-bg: #293e40 !default;
$brand-warning: #DFD139 !default;
$brand-danger: #C83C36 !default;
$sp-tagline-color: #ffffff !default;
$navbar-inverse-link-color: #A7B0B2 !default;
$brand-info: #6ABECF !default;
$link-color: $brand-primary !default;
$sp-logo-margin-x: 15px !default;
$text-muted: $gray-light !default;
////////////////////////////////////

// Link hover decoration
$link-hover-decoration: underline !default;

// La Jolla variables
$brand-primary-dark: #1F8476 !default;
$brand-primary-darker: #165C53 !default;
$brand-primary-light: #5FBAA4 !default;
$brand-primary-lighter: #B8E0D7 !default;
$brand-primary-lightest: #EEF8F8 !default;
$dropdown-link-disabled-color: $gray-light;
$link-hover-color: darken(desaturate(adjust-hue($link-color, 1), 0.42%), 16.67);
$navbar-inverse-link-active-bg: #213234;
$navbar-inverse-link-hover-bg: $brand-primary;
$panel-primary-border: $brand-primary ;
$panel-primary-heading-bg: $brand-primary ;
$panel-primary-text: #ffffff;
$primary: $brand-primary;
$input-border-focus: #1f8476;
$quicklinks-background: #EDF7F5;
$btn-success-bg: $brand-success;
$btn-default-color: #2e2e2e;
$btn-primary-color: #ffffff;
$btn-primary-bg: $brand-primary;
$btn-primary-border: darken($btn-primary-bg, 5%);
$btn-success-bg: $brand-success;
$btn-success-border: darken($btn-success-bg, 5%);
$btn-success-color: darken(desaturate(adjust-hue($brand-success, 3), 15.64%), 34.31);
$component-active-color: $gray;
$component-active-bg: #f5f5f5;
$state-danger-bg: lighten(saturate(adjust-hue($brand-danger, 354), 42.52%), 42.94);
$state-danger-border: $brand-danger;
$state-danger-text: darken(saturate(adjust-hue($brand-danger, 2), 1.25%), 25.10);
$state-info-bg: lighten(desaturate($brand-info, 3.27%), 19.02);
$state-info-border: $brand-info;
$state-info-text: darken(desaturate(adjust-hue($brand-info, 1), 2.75%), 41.57);
$state-success-bg: lighten(saturate($brand-success, 3.67%), 28.24);
$state-success-border: $brand-success;
$state-warning-bg: lighten(saturate(adjust-hue($brand-warning, -3), 17.70%), 29.61);
$state-warning-border: $brand-warning;
$state-warning-text: darken(desaturate(adjust-hue($brand-warning, -4), 20.32%), 44.31);
$alert-danger-bg: $state-danger-bg;
$alert-danger-border: $state-danger-border;
$alert-danger-text: $state-danger-text;
$alert-info-bg: $state-info-bg;
$alert-info-border: $state-info-border;
$alert-info-text: $state-info-text;
$alert-success-bg: $state-success-bg;
$alert-success-border: $state-success-border;
$alert-success-text: $state-success-text;
$alert-warning-bg: $state-warning-bg;
$alert-warning-border: $state-warning-border;
$alert-warning-text: $state-warning-text;

// To get service status messages consistent with brand colors
$primary: $brand-primary;
$secondary: $brand-secondary;
$warning: $brand-warning;
$success: $brand-success;
$info: $brand-info;
$danger: $brand-danger;
$input-border-placeholder: white;


// Service Catalog panel hover highlight
$panel-list-item: lighten(desaturate(adjust-hue($panel-primary-heading-bg, -6), 20.79%), 58.04);
$panel-primary-heading-bg: #47a992;

$multiple-issues-color: #7070B3;
$no-issue-color: lighten($brand-success, 40%);
$planned-maintenance-color: lighten($brand-info, 35%);
$service-degredation-color: lighten($brand-warning, 40%);
$service-outage-color: lighten($brand-danger, 45%);

$no-issue-border-color: $brand-success;
$planned-maintenance-border-color: $brand-info;
$service-degredation-border-color: $brand-warning;
$service-outage-border-color: $brand-danger;

$no-issues-text: $state-success-text;
$planned-maintenance-text: $state-info-text;
$service-degredation-text: $state-info-text;
$service-outage-text: $state-danger-bg;

$login-btn-bg: $btn-primary-bg;
$login-btn-border: $btn-primary-border;

$qa-tag-color: $state-info-text;
$qa-tag-bg: $state-info-bg;
$qa-tag-border: $state-info-bg;
$qa-tag-hover-color: darken($qa-tag-color, 10%);
$qa-tag-hover-bg: darken($qa-tag-bg, 10%);

$qa-thread-tag-color: $state-info-text;
$qa-thread-tag-bg: $state-info-bg;
$qa-thread-tag-hover-color: darken($qa-thread-tag-color, 10%);
$qa-thread-tag-hover-bg: darken($qa-thread-tag-bg, 10%);

$qa-panel-link-color: $link-color;
$select2-container-active: $input-border-focus;

$not-webkit-outline-color: $input-border-focus;
$webkit-outline-color: $input-border-focus;

$label-success-bg: lighten(saturate($brand-success, 3.67%), 28.24);
$label-info-bg: lighten(desaturate($brand-info, 3.27%), 19.02);
$label-warning-bg: lighten(saturate(adjust-hue($brand-warning, -3), 17.70%), 29.61);
$label-danger-bg: lighten(saturate(adjust-hue($brand-danger, 354), 42.52%), 42.94);
$label-primary-bg : #C83C36;
$data-table-selected: $brand-primary;

$button-selected-color: $btn-primary-bg;
$dropdown-link-active-bg: $brand-primary;
$dropdown-link-active-color: #ffffff;
$widget-editor-fa-bg: $brand-primary;

$input-border-tab-focus: $input-border-focus;

$fav-star-color: $brand-warning;
$fav-star-color-off: #ffffff;
$fav-star-outline-color: #6b611f;
$fav-star-outline: -1px 0 $fav-star-outline-color, 0 1px $fav-star-outline-color, 1px 0$fav-star-outline-color, 0 -1px $fav-star-outline-color;

$sc-field-error-color: #1a424b;
$qa-star-color-on: $brand-warning;
$qa-star-color-off: #ffffff;

$list-group-link-color: $brand-primary;
$list-group-hover-bg: lighten($panel-primary-heading-bg, 40%);

$accessible-placeholder-gray: #565656;


a{
 cursor: pointer;
}

@media (max-width: 768px){
	main{
          overflow-x: hidden;
    }
}

@media (min-width: 1200px) and (max-width: 1250px){
  .container {
      width: 1055px;
  }
}

@media (min-width: 992px) and (max-width: 1199px){
  .container {
      width: 925px;
  }
}

@media (min-width: 768px){

  .sidebar-expanded{
      padding-left: 250px;
      .container{
          width: 90%;
      }
      .portal-padding{
          padding: 0 60px;
      }
  }
  
}


@media (min-width: 768px) and (max-width: 890px){
	.sidebar-collapsed{   
      .container{
        width: 665px !important;
        position: relative;
        left: 19px;
      }
    }
}


    
body main, .portal-padding {
    transition: .5s;
    padding-top: 0 !important;
}

</css_variables><footer/><footer_fixed>false</footer_fixed><header display_value="Header Menu with Sidebar">151b78051b0c5410c26db9121b4bcbe1</header><name>Theme Side menu</name><navbar_fixed>true</navbar_fixed><sys_class_name>sp_theme</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>willian_costa</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-03-17 21:15:10</sys_created_on><sys_id>cbca4308074720109eaef19d7c1ed0c9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Theme Side menu</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_theme_cbca4308074720109eaef19d7c1ed0c9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>willian_costa</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-03-24 17:27:11</sys_updated_on></sp_theme></record_update>
